description: Values of Russian money (in kopecks; 100 kopecks = 1 rouble).
comments: Notable for quite an unobvious choice of values. Before the hyper-inflation, the sequence ended at 10000 (== 100 roubles), afterwards the sequence follows the 1-2-5-10-20-50 rule
author: _Leonid Broukhis_, Jan 02 2000
